EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_CFPlatform_Q214.Early Bird Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Early for the Cloud Foundry Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Early bird registration is now open <http://cfsummit.com/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cfsummit2014>! Please join us at Pivotal's premier event for developers and cloud operators using the industry's leading Open Source Platform-as-a-Service: Cloud Foundry. Attendees will engage with core contributors to the project and real world users to discuss deep technical topics, engineering roadmap, community ecosystem and operational best practices.
The Cloud Foundry Summit <http://cfsummit.com/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cfsummit2014> is designed for interaction and discussion. With community-led case study sessions and a dedicated un-conference to organize attendee-voted session topics, this conference is all about you. Connect with other dedicated members of the Cloud Foundry community to share information, exchange ideas and influence the future direction of Open Source Platform-as-a-Service.
Check out last year's Cloud Foundry Summit <http://cfsummit.com/2013> to see what the excitement is about!
We want to hear from you! Topic submissions accepted until May 2. Submit your idea now <http://cfsummit.com/#submissions>.
FORWARD TO A FRIEND >>
